text: On early Saturday morning, a drunk driver crashed into a house in North Waco, Texas. Allen Wayne Miller plowed through the front of 1902 Alexander Ave, which happens to be a home featured on the third season of HGTV's Fixer Upper show. Here's the home as it appeared after its makeover from Chip and Joanna Gaines : HGTV / Rachel Whyte Nicknamed the ` ` Three Little Pigs'' house, the property belongs to Ken and Kelly Downs.
